<div class="fixed z-10 inset-0 overflow-y-auto" aria-labelledby="modal-title" role="dialog" aria-modal="true">
    <div class="flex items-end justify-center min-h-screen pt-4 px-4 pb-20 text-center sm:block sm:p-0">
        <!--
      Background overlay, show/hide based on modal state.

      Entering: "ease-out duration-300"
        From: "opacity-0"
        To: "opacity-100"
      Leaving: "ease-in duration-200"
        From: "opacity-100"
        To: "opacity-0"
    -->
        <div class="fixed inset-0 bg-gray-500 bg-opacity-75 transition-opacity" aria-hidden="true"></div>

        <!-- This element is to trick the browser into centering the modal contents. -->
        <span class="hidden sm:inline-block sm:align-middle sm:h-screen" aria-hidden="true">&#8203;</span>

        <!--
      Modal panel, show/hide based on modal state.

      Entering: "ease-out duration-300"
        From: "opacity-0 translate-y-4 sm:translate-y-0 sm:scale-95"
        To: "opacity-100 translate-y-0 sm:scale-100"
      Leaving: "ease-in duration-200"
        From: "opacity-100 translate-y-0 sm:scale-100"
        To: "opacity-0 translate-y-4 sm:translate-y-0 sm:scale-95"
    -->
        <div class="inline-block align-bottom bg-white rounded-lg px-4 pt-5 pb-4 text-left overflow-hidden shadow-xl transform transition-all sm:my-8 sm:align-middle sm:max-w-2xl sm:w-full sm:p-20">
            <div class="sm:flex sm:items-start">
                <div class="mt-3 text-center sm:mt-0 sm:ml-4 sm:text-left">
                    <h2 class="text-base font-semibold tracking-wider text-blue-500 uppercase">Organizational Info</h2>
                    <h1 class="text-2xl leading-tight font-semibold text-gray-900" id="modal-title">
                        Thank you for completing your profile. Your customized resources have been selected.
                    </h1>
                    <div class="mt-2">
                        <p class="text-sm text-gray-500">
                            Please provide your details so we can send these customized resources to your inbox.
                        </p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="mx-4 mt-4">
                <label for="first-name" class="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700">
                    Name
                </label>
                <div class="mt-1">
                    <input type="text" name="first-name" id="first-name" autocomplete="given-name" class="shadow-sm focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 block w-full sm:text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md">
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mx-4 mt-4">
                <label for="email" class="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700">
                    Email address
                </label>
                <div class="mt-1">
                    <input id="email" name="email" type="email" autocomplete="email" class="shadow-sm focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 block w-full sm:text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md">
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mx-4 mt-4">
                <label for="org" class="block text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700">
                    Organization
                </label>
                <div class="mt-1">
                    <input id="org" name="emorgail" type="text" class="shadow-sm focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 block w-full sm:text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md">
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mx-4 mt-4">
                <fieldset>
                    <legend class="sr-only">
                        Options
                    </legend>
                    <div class="space-y-4">
                        <div class="relative flex items-start">
                            <div class="flex items-center h-5">
                                <input id="updates" name="updates" type="checkbox" class="focus:ring-indigo-500 h-4 w-4 text-indigo-600 border-gray-300 rounded">
                            </div>
                            <div class="ml-3 text-sm">
                                <label for="updates" class="font-semibold text-gray-700">I agree to receive emails from Year Up about YearUp resources.</label>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="relative flex items-start">
                            <div class="flex items-center h-5">
                                <input id="newsletter" name="newsletter" type="checkbox" class="focus:ring-indigo-500 h-4 w-4 text-indigo-600 border-gray-300 rounded">
                            </div>
                            <div class="ml-3 text-sm">
                                <label for="newsletter" class="font-semibold text-gray-700">I agree to sign up for the Year Up newsletter containing information about partnership opportunities and upcoming webinars/events.</label>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </fieldset>
            </div>

            <div class="mt-5 sm:mt-4 sm:pl-4 sm:flex">

                <a href="#" class="w-full inline-flex justify-center items-center px-4 py-2 border border-transparent text-xs font-bold rounded-md shadow-sm text-white bg-blue-400 shadow hover:bg-blue-500 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-blue-500 sm:w-auto">
                    Complete Profile
                </a>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
 
<div class="fixed z-10 inset-0 overflow-y-auto" aria-labelledby="modal-title" role="dialog" aria-modal="true">
  <div class="flex items-end justify-center min-h-screen pt-4 px-4 pb-20 text-center sm:block sm:p-0">
    <!--
      Background overlay, show/hide based on modal state.

      Entering: "ease-out duration-300"
        From: "opacity-0"
        To: "opacity-100"
      Leaving: "ease-in duration-200"
        From: "opacity-100"
        To: "opacity-0"
    -->

    <!--
      Modal panel, show/hide based on modal state.

      Entering: "ease-out duration-300"
        From: "opacity-0 translate-y-4 sm:translate-y-0 sm:scale-95"
        To: "opacity-100 translate-y-0 sm:scale-100"

        From: "opacity-100 translate-y-0 sm:scale-100"
        To: "opacity-0 translate-y-4 sm:translate-y-0 sm:scale-95"
    -->
    <div class="inline-block align-bottom bg-white rounded-lg px-4 pt-5 pb-4 text-left overflow-hidden shadow-xl transform transition-all sm:my-8 sm:align-middle sm:max-w-2xl sm:w-full sm:p-20">

            Email address
        </label>

              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </fieldset>
      </div>

      <div class="mt-5 sm:mt-4 sm:pl-4 sm:flex">
        {% if button.primary %}
          {% render '@button--small', button.primary, true %}
        {% endif %}
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

    "primary": {
